item.description:
We are joining forces with the Boston Volunteer Group for an awesome party.

 

The Boston Volunteers organize events around Boston and are hosting their 'Popular Party' in December. Expect hundreds to be partying! They have the entire second floor reserved. There will be complimentary food, drink specials, and a chance to meet and greet some of the coolest folks around.

Pick up a Boston Volunteer T-shirt, bring a friend who you think might like to get involved, schmooze with the event organizers, and spend time with some truly great people.

 

When: December 1, 2012

Time: 6:15pm

Where: Jose McIntyre's, 160 Milk Street, Boston. MA. 02109
item.how_to_find_us: The whole 2nd floor of Jose McIntyre's to ourselves. Look for Josh at the top of the stairs.
item.name: Boston Volunteers Popular Party
